title: Plaited loaf
ingredients: ['14g (1/2 oz) dried active baking yeast', '100ml (4 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '450ml (16 fl oz) hot semi-skimmed milk', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '100g (4 oz) butter', '2 teaspoons salt', '125ml (4 1/2 fl oz) water', '5 eggs', '1.3kg (3 lb) plain flour', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
